snippet: For about the 2,300th Saturday, former mayor Edward I. Koch hosted friends at his apartment, and  the conversation included matters both weighty and less so.
abstract: Former New York City Mayor Edward I Koch hosts his 2,300th Saturday gathering of friends at his Greenwich Village apartment; Koch reports that his personal version of the Algonquin Round Table is rife with disagreements over matters both weighty and less so.
lead_paragraph: For about the 2,300th Saturday, former mayor Edward I. Koch hosted friends at his apartment, and  the conversation included matters both weighty and less so.

headline.seo: The Algonquin Table at Mayor Koch’s Place
headline.main: Convening an Algonquin Table at Koch’s Place
headline.print_headline: Convening An Algonquin Table At Koch’s Place
